content:
A consistent morning routine is a great goal! A healthy breakfast can give you a wonderful boost to start your day. Here are some quick and nutritious breakfast ideas that can be prepared in 30 minutes or less:

**1. Overnight Oats** (5 minutes prep, 20 minutes soak)
Mix rolled oats, milk, and your choice of nuts, seeds, or fruit in a jar. Refrigerate overnight and enjoy in the morning.

**2. Avocado Toast** (10 minutes)
 Toast whole grain bread, mash an avocado, and spread on top. Add a fried egg or a sprinkle of red pepper flakes for extra protein.

**3. Greek Yogurt Parfait** (10 minutes)
Layer Greek yogurt, fresh berries, granola, and a sprinkle of honey in a bowl.

**4. Smoothie** (5 minutes)
Blend your favorite fruits, yogurt, and milk to create a quick and nutritious breakfast smoothie.

**5. Peanut Butter Banana Toast** (5 minutes)
 Toast whole grain bread, spread with peanut butter, and top with sliced banana.

**6. Breakfast Burrito** (15 minutes)
Scramble eggs, add black beans, cheese, and salsa. Wrap in a whole grain tortilla.

**7. Muffin Tin Frittatas** (20 minutes)
Whisk eggs, milk, and diced veggies. Pour into muffin tins and bake until set.

**8. Cottage Cheese and Fruit** (5 minutes)
Mix cottage cheese with fruit like berries or sliced peaches for a high-protein breakfast.

**9. Green Smoothie Bowl** (10 minutes)
Blend spinach, avocado, banana, and milk. Top with granola, nuts, and fresh fruit.

**10. Hard-Boiled Eggs** (10 minutes)
Boil eggs the night before and keep in the fridge for a quick protein-packed breakfast on-the-go.

**11. Chia Seed Pudding** (10 minutes)
Mix chia seeds with milk and let it sit overnight. Top with fresh fruit and nuts in the morning.

**12. Whole Grain Waffles with Fresh Fruit and Yogurt** (15 minutes)
Make whole grain waffles and top with fresh fruit and a dollop of yogurt.

These breakfast ideas are quick, healthy, and delicious. Experiment with different combinations to find your favorite!
